subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown winner in 37 years, will make his next start in the $1 million Haskell Invitational on Aug. 2.
snippet: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown winner in 37 years, will make his next start in the $1 million Haskell Invitational on Aug. 2.
